name: Rope Dart Dojo
description:
Welcome to the Rope Dart Dojo!
Face the trials and you too can become a Jōhyō Master!
Your Rope gets longer each Wave, making it more difficult to control.

How to Play (also in game)

  • Move your mouse around to guide your Hand and Blade.
  • Left Click to Slash
  • Right Click to Thrust
  • Space Bar to Slow Time

Notes

  • There seems to be an issue with the WebGL version Audio, preventing the Slow Time to affect the audio pitch. The downloaded version works correctly.
  • I also seem to have broken repeated play throughs. Will be patched after the game jam ends. :)

Music
Modern Samurai (By Steve Oxen)
www.fesliyanstudios.com
